languages.text: "Тогда есть шанс выскочить из игры и не проиграть. Но сделать это можно только до момента, пока никто не заявил, что будет вскрываться".
"Then you have a chance to bow out of the game without losing. But you can only do that before someone announces they're going to show their hand."
languages.original_text: "Тогда есть шанс выскочить из игры и не проиграть. Но сделать это можно только до момента, пока никто не заявил, что будет вскрываться".

traits.locale_text: "Then you have a chance to bow out of the game without losing. But you can only do that before someone announces they're going to show their hand."
"Then you have a chance to bow out of the game without losing. But you can only do that before someone announces they're going to show their hand."
"Then you have a chance to bow out of the game without losing. But you can only do that before someone announces they're going to show their hand."
"Then you have a chance to bow out of the game without losing. But you can only do that before someone announces they're going to show their hand."

languages.text: “那你就可以直接退出这一局，不算输。不过，你只能在有人开牌之前弃牌。”
languages.original_text: "Then you have a chance to bow out of the game without losing. But you can only do that before someone announces they're going to show their hand."

traits.locale_text: “那你就可以直接退出这一局，不算输。不过，你只能在有人开牌之前弃牌。”

languages.text: 「そうすれば、負けることなくゲームを終えるチャンスがある。でも、それができるのは、誰かが手札を見せると宣言する前だけ」
languages.original_text: "Then you have a chance to bow out of the game without losing. But you can only do that before someone announces they're going to show their hand."

traits.locale_text: 「そうすれば、負けることなくゲームを終えるチャンスがある。でも、それができるのは、誰かが手札を見せると宣言する前だけ」

languages.text: «Entonces tiene la oportunidad de abandonar la partida sin perder. Pero solo puede hacerlo si nadie ha anunciado que va a mostrar su mano».
languages.original_text: "Then you have a chance to bow out of the game without losing. But you can only do that before someone announces they're going to show their hand."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces tiene la oportunidad de abandonar la partida sin perder. Pero solo puede hacerlo si nadie ha anunciado que va a mostrar su mano».

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, vous avez une chance de quitter la partie sans rien perdre. Mais une fois qu'un autre joueur a annoncé vouloir poser sa main, vous ne pouvez plus vous désister. »
languages.original_text: "Then you have a chance to bow out of the game without losing. But you can only do that before someone announces they're going to show their hand."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, vous avez une chance de quitter la partie sans rien perdre. Mais une fois qu'un autre joueur a annoncé vouloir poser sa main, vous ne pouvez plus vous désister. »

languages.text: "Es gibt noch die Möglichkeit, aus dem Spiel auszusteigen, ohne zu verlieren. Aber das geht nur, bis jemand ankündigt, dass er seine Hand offenlegen will."
languages.original_text: "Then you have a chance to bow out of the game without losing. But you can only do that before someone announces they're going to show their hand."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt noch die Möglichkeit, aus dem Spiel auszusteigen, ohne zu verlieren. Aber das geht nur, bis jemand ankündigt, dass er seine Hand offenlegen will."

languages.text: "O zaman kaybetmeden oyundan çekilme şansı oluyor ama bu, yalnızca birisi elini açacağını söylemeden önce yapılabiliyor."
languages.original_text: "Then you have a chance to bow out of the game without losing. But you can only do that before someone announces they're going to show their hand."

traits.locale_text: "O zaman kaybetmeden oyundan çekilme şansı oluyor ama bu, yalnızca birisi elini açacağını söylemeden önce yapılabiliyor."
